# VisualShaderNodeTransformOp

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) operator to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Applies [operator](VisualShaderNodeTransformOp.md#VisualShaderNodeTransformOp_property_operator) to two transform (4Ã—4 matrices) inputs.
